amendment.description: To improve section 1653, relating to ground-based interceptor capability, capacity, and reliability.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1073 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 1073 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 1003. (consideration: CR S5787; text: CR S5795) To improve section 1653, relating to ground-based interceptor capability, capacity, and reliability.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1073 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1073 proposed by Senator McCain for Senator Sullivan to Amendment SA 1003.
